header.name: Tomb of Tyroxos
header.author: BSP-Dungeon-Generator
header.description: The tomb of Tyroxos is situated deep in the sun-drenched desert, away from busy roads. Now it is controlled by a band of thugs.

game_elements.name: Item 1
game_elements.description: A scorched stone door with a keyhole on the southern wall of the large room.

game_elements.name: Item 2
game_elements.description: A reinforced sarcophagus holds a key.

game_elements.name: Item 3
game_elements.description: A mosaic of a star pattern on the floor

game_elements.name: Item 4
game_elements.description: An ornate lamp, tells a story of this place when lit.
